instructions.title: Check for Recycling Options
instructions.description: Some places accept plastic cutlery for recycling.

instructions.title: Trash It
instructions.description: If not recyclable, dispose of in the trash.

instructions.title: Compost It
instructions.description: If made of natural materials, place in compost.

instructions.title: Trash It
instructions.description: If it contains plastic, dispose of in trash.

instructions.title: Check for Grease
instructions.description: If heavily soiled, it's better to trash it.

instructions.title: Recycle Clean Parts
instructions.description: Recyclable if no grease or food residue is present.

instructions.title: Remove Bristles
instructions.description: Pluck out nylon bristles and dispose separately.

instructions.title: Compost Handle
instructions.description: The bamboo handle can be composted.

instructions.title: Rinse the Can
instructions.description: Remove food residue before recycling.

instructions.title: Recycle It
instructions.description: Place in the recycling bin.

instructions.title: Check Local Recycling Guidelines
instructions.description: Some areas have specific recycling for Styrofoam.

instructions.title: Trash It
instructions.description: If not recyclable, dispose of in the trash.

instructions.title: Empty the Bottle
instructions.description: Make sure there is no leftover liquid inside.

instructions.title: Remove the Cap
instructions.description: Caps are often made from different plastic and should be recycled separately.

instructions.title: Recycle
instructions.description: Place the bottle in the recycling bin.

instructions.title: Rinse and Clean
instructions.description: Make sure it's clean before recycling.

instructions.title: Recycle
instructions.description: Place it in the glass recycling bin.

instructions.title: Rinse Out Residue
instructions.description: Rinse the can to remove food or drink residue.

instructions.title: Recycle
instructions.description: Place the can in the recycling bin.

instructions.title: Check for Lining
instructions.description: Most paper cups have plastic lining and cannot be recycled.

instructions.title: Trash It
instructions.description: If not recyclable, dispose of in the trash.

instructions.title: Return to Store
instructions.description: Some grocery stores have recycling bins for plastic bags.

instructions.title: Trash It
instructions.description: If not recyclable, dispose of in the trash.

instructions.title: Compost It
instructions.description: Add eggshells to your compost for calcium enrichment.

instructions.title: Donate If Usable
instructions.description: If in good condition, donate to charity.

instructions.title: Recycle Textile
instructions.description: Check for local textile recycling programs.

instructions.title: Return to Retailer
instructions.description: Many tire retailers accept old tires for recycling.

instructions.title: Find a Tire Recycling Center
instructions.description: Specialized facilities handle used tires properly.

instructions.title: Compost It
instructions.description: Unpainted wooden chopsticks can go in compost.

instructions.title: Find an E-Waste Recycler
instructions.description: Many e-waste programs accept CDs and DVDs.

instructions.title: Donate If Usable
instructions.description: Give away working discs to secondhand stores.

instructions.title: Rinse and Flatten
instructions.description: Ensure it's empty and flatten for recycling.

instructions.title: Recycle If Allowed
instructions.description: Check if your local recycling program accepts cartons.

instructions.title: Check for Recycling Program
instructions.description: Some brands offer specialized recycling programs.

instructions.title: Trash It
instructions.description: If no recycling option, dispose in trash.

instructions.title: Store and Drop Off
instructions.description: Collect in a container and take to a disposal center.

instructions.title: Never Pour Down Drain
instructions.description: Oil can clog pipes and harm the environment.

instructions.title: Compost It
instructions.description: Natural cork is biodegradable and compostable.

instructions.title: Recycle If Available
instructions.description: Some companies accept cork for recycling.

instructions.title: Check for Mail-In Programs
instructions.description: Some brands offer razor recycling programs.

instructions.title: Trash It
instructions.description: If no recycling option, place in trash.

instructions.title: Find a Recycling Drop-Off
instructions.description: Many stores accept batteries for proper disposal.

instructions.title: Never Throw in Trash
instructions.description: Batteries contain hazardous materials.

instructions.title: Find E-Waste Collection
instructions.description: Laptop batteries should be taken to an electronics recycler.

instructions.title: Never Trash It
instructions.description: Batteries can leak harmful chemicals into the environment.

instructions.title: Recycle If Possible
instructions.description: Some recycling programs accept plastic straws.

instructions.title: Trash It
instructions.description: If not recyclable, dispose of in the trash.

instructions.title: Re-use If Possible
instructions.description: Consider reusing or donating if in good condition.

instructions.title: Recycle If Clean
instructions.description: Make sure it's clean before recycling.

instructions.title: Flatten the Box
instructions.description: Make sure it's flattened for efficient recycling.

instructions.title: Recycle It
instructions.description: Place in a designated paper recycling bin.

instructions.title: Compost It
instructions.description: Banana peels break down well in compost.

instructions.title: Find a Recycling Program
instructions.description: LED bulbs should be taken to designated recycling centers.

instructions.title: Do Not Throw in Trash
instructions.description: Some bulbs contain hazardous materials.

instructions.title: Flatten and Recycle
instructions.description: Make sure the box is empty and flatten it before recycling.

instructions.title: Compost It
instructions.description: Used coffee grounds enrich soil when composted.

instructions.title: Check for Recycling Options
instructions.description: Some recycling centers accept bubble wrap.

instructions.title: Reuse for Packing
instructions.description: Consider reusing it for shipping or storage.

instructions.title: Check Repair Options
instructions.description: Consider repairing if feasible.

instructions.title: Dispose of in Trash
instructions.description: If not repairable, discard in the trash.

instructions.title: Recycle If Accepted
instructions.description: Check local guidelines for recycling plastic lids.

instructions.title: Trash It
instructions.description: If not recyclable, dispose of in the trash.

instructions.title: Compost If Unsoiled
instructions.description: If used for drying hands or cleaning, compost it.

instructions.title: Trash If Soiled
instructions.description: If contaminated with food or chemicals, throw it away.

instructions.title: Wash Before Recycling
instructions.description: Clean food containers before placing in recycling.

instructions.title: Trash If Not Accepted
instructions.description: If not recyclable, dispose of in the trash.

instructions.title: Compost It
instructions.description: Add vegetable scraps to your compost bin.
